title: What is MBFT
content: MBFT (Mohun Bagan Fan Talks) is a fan-driven platform dedicated to Mohun Bagan Athletic Club. It focuses on news, analysis, fan discussions, and content related exclusively to Mohun Bagan.

title: Mohun Bagan Athletic Club
content: Mohun Bagan Athletic Club is an Indian sports club based in Kolkata, founded in 1889. It is one of the oldest football clubs in Asia and is known for winning the IFA Shield in 1911 against East Yorkshire Regiment.
